item.title: Infinifactory
item.description:
Infinifactory

The game's loading screen presents tips, and one of them in particular is ironically amusing; it suggests that a working solution is more important than making one which is fast or elegant. But there it is; fast and elegant solutions are the entire draw of the thing. So addicting they are that a tip had to be written to remind the player that they also have to actually solve the problem, and not just endlessly optimize.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description:
No Man's Sky

No Man's Sky might just change everything. All aboard the hype train, because it might just be the most anticipated game in the world right now!

item.title: Samurai Gunn
item.description:
Samurai Gunn

Samurai Gunn was released in December of 2013. Developer Teknopants conceived the idea for a fun party game (at a party, natch.), and executed it flawlessly.
